label: Template to use in creating the date-based episode titles. Values supported are ${episode_date|DATE_FORMAT}, ${episode_title}, ${show_title}
Template to use in creating the date-based episode summaries. Values supported are ${episode_date|DATE_FORMAT}, ${episode_title}, ${show_title}
Template to use in creating the episode-based episode titles. Values supported are ${episode_title} and ${show_title}
Template to use in creating the episode-based episode summaries. Values supported are ${episode_title} and ${show_title}
